NodeNotePackage.NodeNote.Components.sub_view module

sub_view.py - Create sub view manager.

class NodeNotePackage.NodeNote.Components.sub_view.ProxyView(root_window, parent=None)

Bases: PyQt5.QtWidgets.QGraphicsProxyWidget, NodeNotePackage.NodeNote.Model.serializable.Serializable

Create embedded view manager. THe function is same as the root view. But Qt QGraphicsView does not support the embedded sub view, the input method is not working in some widgets, I figure out this problem in attribute widget/InputField.

deserialize(data, hashmap: dict, view=None, flag=True)

Deserialization.

Parameters

  • data – Google protobuff object.

  • hashmap – Hashmap.

  • view – The manager.

  • flag – Deserialize in two times.
